results.title: Prevalence and overlap of different lipid abnormalities in statin-treated patients at high cardiovascular risk in clinical practice in Germany
results.text_hl: The great majority of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were on chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment (83.9%).
